content: my patchwork pumpkin crochet pattern for 2024 combines my love of crocheting with the aesthetic of patchwork quilting i used different crochet textures and stitches to make a crochet patchwork pumpkin that is perfect for fall it is best suited for a more adventurous or advanced crocheter **materials** ▢5 mm crochet hook i used a furls onyx hook ▢red heart yarns - pumpkin ▢red heart yarns - gold ▢red heart yarns - hot red ▢red heart yarns - aran ▢red heart yarns - cafe latte ▢polyfill stuffing ▢tapestry needle **abbreviations us terms ** chains - chain single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet back loop only - blo magic_ring - magic_ring special stitches = bobble camel
